data.actual_result: You can't reconnect to this voice channel as it still shows the "Mute/Deafen/Disconnect" controls instead of the Connect button. The only way to reconnect to this VC is to switch to another VC or restart the app
data.expected_result: It should've disconnected you completely from the voice channel and you should be able to reconnect to the same VC
data.short_description: Unable to reconnect to voice channel after being forcibly disconnected due to internet issues
data.steps_to_repro: - Connect to any voice channel - While you are connected, turn off the internet connection of your device (disable wifi or enter airplane mode)  - Try to disconnect from voice channel as well using the Disconnect button (this step is important)  - Enable your internet back
